resources.string:
Since you are playing against a machine, the objective is to get the best hand.
 Video Poker deals a five cards hand by pressing the "Deal" button.
You can hold or throw away as many cards as you like by pressing on the cards to hold them.
After selecting the card(s) you want to hold or discard, pressing on "Draw" Button.
The cards you didn’t hold are replaced with new cards.
If the new hand contains a winning combination, you get paid and your score increases.

JACKS OR BETTER
Jacks or Better hand rankings.
The winning hands for Jacks or Better from highest to lowest are:
Royal Flush - 10, J, Q, K and A of the same suit.
Straight Flush – Five consecutive cards in the same suit, for instance 7, 8, 9, 10 and J.
Four of a Kind – A hand with four cards of the same value, such as four Nines.
Full House - Three cards of one value, and two cards of another value, like three Sixes and two Queens.
Flush – Any five cards of the same suit.
Straight – Any five consecutive cards, such as 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 but not in the same suit.
Three of a Kind - Three cards of the same value, three Fives for instance.
Two Pair – A hand containing two pairs, such as two Eights and two Kings.
Pair of Jacks or Better – A pair of Jacks, Queens, Kings or Aces makes up the lowest paying hand.
